website_summaries.verdict: This attractive wood and bronze powder-coated porch swing is the perfect addition for your outdoor space. A 2-person swing that is comfortable, and will look quaint and classic on your porch.
pros: Made with quality hardwood that looks great and feels durable
Has beautiful wood bronze powder-coated accents
cons: Some have said the wood treatment tends to rub off
Some components have pre-drilled holes that aren't aligned correctly, making assembly frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding item with very good quality parts enclosed. 2 humans required for assembly process. I treated the wood prior to assembly and utilized a electric nutdriver to expedite the final product. Recommend swing springs to help weight distribution. Took about 4 hours for final assembly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Capella

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Swing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about the quality because of the price, but it's actually a very nice, sturdy swing. The swing is easy to assembly, but you must have the tools to do it, such as the proper wrench or socket size. Don't over tighten the nuts or the slats will crack. The included chain is very sturdy. As the directions recommend, the wooden slats should be stained for added protection, especially if the swing will be exposed to rain. It's best to do this prior to assembly. I used an oil based, semitransparent stain of similar color as the slats and the results look great.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swing
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this for a few days. Put it together by myself, directions are clear enough. Beware that the stain or wood treatment or whatever it is they put on it rubs off (they recommend cleaning it before assembly, definitely a must). I'm assuming this will stop over time and til then have an old sheet over it to keep the stain off my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: swing was delivered timely. it did have some marks where pieces rubbed together during shipping. The box could have been sturdier.It had to be sanded for the marks and to smooth the boards. I put two coats of poly on it even after the instructions said not to. It turned out beautiful. My wife was very pleased.The reason i'm not worried about using the poly is it will be used on our front porch. Mainly out of the weather. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: joe crask

customer_reviews.title: A really fine awing sseat
customer_reviews.text: This swing seat is exceptional in one respect - all the parts fit without a problem. That is high praise, when you have bent heavy wall steel tubing with three bolts that must all line up. Assembly was straightforward, but you gotta read carefully all the steps to take. Nowhere does the sheet say the size of the wrench - just one; 7/16 inch. Both a socket and a combination wrench are needed. The bench is comfortable. I decided to smooth-sand the wood pieces and coat them with transparent stain before assembly, which made it even nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard of WID

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swing great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as a surprise for me to replace an old one at our cabin. As others have said and the directions suggest, I polyurethaned the slates before I assembled it. The wood is pretty, but after I stained it-it was beautiful! I suggest laying all the slats out in order before assembling it. Mine had different depths of color and grain lines. It is easy to put together and all the hardware is marked. I liked the gold/yellow chain that came with it. I am extremely happy with the look and quality of the swing. I would definitely buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: Garden Swing Seat easy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This garden swing is exactly what I expected. It was not difficult to assemble, but it does require 2 people because of its size and number of parts. Once assembled and hung, I was pleased with its design. It has curved edges that make it more comfortable for a short person like me. I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: L. Bell

customer_reviews.title: The colors are wonderful and the gold chain just adds to the beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: The swing far exceeded my expectations! The colors are wonderful and the gold chain just adds to the beautiful swing. I will enjoy it as soon as the humidity decreases but I love looking at it and can't wait to use it more!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia McBroom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair. We haven't mounted it yet but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair. We haven't mounted it yet but it was not difficult to assemble. The only issue is where they put the holes for the slats. The wood is good and dry but when mounted where there is an inside curve you have to be careful not to tighten the carriage bolts too tightly. I slightly cracked a couple of the boards but it won't affect the use of the swing.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Some of the bolts started to come loose after use
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy but tedious. It was a huge upgrade from our rotting swing, I just spray painted the frame and hung this swing in its place. Only problem is Some of the bolts started to come loose after use and it didn't come with any extra pieces
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: The swing was fairly easy to install for one person
customer_reviews.text: The swing was fairly easy to install for one person. One thing to note was that one of the holes was not drilled all the way through so we had to drill it through. No big deal as long as you have the right tools. This is a very nice addition to our screened-in porch. I've always wanted one of these. I also bought the swing extension spring which adds an extra bounce.
customer_reviews.author: RacerR

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just hung it up and love it! Added the cushions but it’s plenty comfy without them. Put a clear coat weather protectant on it. Easy enough to assemble- a couple screws pulled through so be gentle! Feels very sturdy and comfy to swing on! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well fit
customer_reviews.text: The swing isn't hard to put together take about an hour give or take. Can be done with one person but quicker and easier with 2 people. The chains provided have plenty of length for height adjustment . The seat is comfortable but easy to go buy a small cushion if you like. Remember this is a 4 foot swing not a 5 foot .
customer_reviews.author: D. Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up but took about an hour doing it by myself. It looks really good for the price and is fairly comfortable for a wooden seat. Comes with everything you need to install as long as you have a roof you can stick the hangers in. Seems like it would be easy to paint/stain if you want a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought this
customer_reviews.text: Our outdoor swings ripped and we didn't want to pay to have the mesh fabric stitched to rip again. I bought an outdoor porch swing last year from a couple who never used it on their porch and love it and when i saw this one, i had to get it. It fits perfectly on the frame i had for the other mesh swings. This swing is sturdy, well made, and was easy assemble. Very happy with the purchase. and now i have two porch swings that look great!!! ( we did stain it first)
customer_reviews.author: sunflower lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing!
customer_reviews.text: This swing came super fast. I was able to put it together by myself in about an hour. The wood is very nice & I think it will look great after it is stained.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bohnsack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, good instructions, looks great, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing. And you cannot beat the price! Only had one issue putting it together; one hole had not been punched in the metal. 2 seconds with a drill press and I was good to go. The materials are good quality and everything fit together properly.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Great swing but chain broke after about 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Great swing but chain broke after about 2 months. Would recommend getting stronger chain from hardware store to hang swing with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing garden swing
customer_reviews.text: The swing is easy to build, the quality is great, and it is comfortable. It was a great purchase. I did see a note suggesting to use the swing in covered areas. I do not have a porch, so it will be exposed to the elements. To help with my situation, I went to Lowe's and purchased a can of clear sealant to help protect the swing from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunAlan

customer_reviews.title: A very nice swing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swing, to relax on our covered porch. Seems sturdy enough, and was pretty easy to assemble with basic tools. This seems a much better value than the others. The only thing I have to complain about is how long it took to ship. I think amazon tries to nudge people into paying for prime, by taking 2 weeks to ship anything to a non-prime account. Wal-Mart got the other swing here within 3 days, and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bench swing is amazing! We've had it for over 6 months now and it still looks brand new. There was some minor assembly involved but nothing too difficult. It's so nice to sit on the porch in the evenings in this swing. This was definitely the best value swing I've ever come across.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for two kids.
customer_reviews.text: You say "2 person swing with chains is a comfortable, classic design perfect for your porch or with our WL-70Z swing frame. Our Country Garden Collection is quality, made to last furniture. The steel frames are painted in a bronze powder coated finish with quality hardwood derived from fruit trees. Assembly Required. Wood care guide included. Maximum Weight Capacity: 500 lbs." So 2 person swing with total wait of 374 lbs and they fell to the ground. Why? look at the photo. hopeless product.
customer_reviews.author: Pikumadi

customer_reviews.title: I love my new swing!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at more expensive swings because I thought they were prettier than this one. But, this one looks great! Very happy with it. Is very sturdy and was not complicated to put together although it took awhile due to having to attach every slat to the frame. But it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One mistake not clear in instructions took me almost 2 hrs to correct! Be sure to pay particular attention to the metal brackets that slats attach to. Be sure you have them in the right spot! Can't express this enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle king

customer_reviews.title: Good swing
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a pain to put together, not hard just several pieces. We went ahead and used some sealer on it, doesn't seem to be treated or treated well. It is very pretty put together. Better than the last couple we purchased from a large retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cost effective outdoor bench. Mine has been hanging under my deck for a year now and it still looks great. I did use some tompson waterseal on this bench since I live in Washington state and its always raining when its not sunny.
customer_reviews.author: tara sleep

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The swing turned out just like I thought it would. It is beautiful and comfortable. I would recommend sanding and staining or putting a protectant on the slata before assembly. As it weathers it gets rough.
customer_reviews.author: smg

customer_reviews.title: Good looking swing. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It's not too hard to assemble. I was alone and it took me about an hour to put together. If you have a little help it would make it easier. I bought two and they look great together. Good value and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: John Faris

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking garden swing
customer_reviews.text: This swing was purchased to replace a worn swing at my parents’ home. They are enjoying the new swing and do so on a daily basis. It looks very nice and is sturdy enough to support two adults. Satisfied with the cost. Shipping was 4 days, I believe, as opposed to the 2-day shipping we’ve come to expect with Prime. Overall, very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very good, strong swing
customer_reviews.text: Very good, strong swing. I love it. I would suggest that a coat of varnish to the wood before putting together. I have only had mine a few weeks when the large slats starting feeling rough.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but a bit of a pain to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit of a beast to put together, and hanging it is definitely a two person job. That said, once put together it works and looks great. Recommend you have a socket set if you are going to assemble these. That said, the instructions were pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang from the balcony in frontof the wood stove in my log cabin. Love it. Not too big. I made the cover. My only issue is that I'm 5 ten and I find the seat a little short. Meaning I wish I could sit deeper in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dubtub

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, terrific price and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two different wings in the past, so we know a thing or two about swings. This by far is the best. The swing contours with your back and it looks positively great. It was very easy to assemble (took about an hour with two people). You can easily pay three times more for a similar quality swing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and great quality. Does not come preassembled
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and great quality. Does not come preassembled. Every board has to be attached but of great quality that this ?extra? work makes up for the savings! Fit even better in the space than the bench it was replacing! The chains are gold which is something to note if you haven't, but that looks great in my house. A simple design, but with some cushions and back pillows, that makes no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Goessling

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Cute swing!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Love this swing. It has a nice color stain. The assembly was not quick but all the parts & hardware were quality. The only thing I would have liked is for the chains to match the bronze color seat frame. The chains are shiny gold :/
customer_reviews.author: Galatians 5:1

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Twice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased twice: painted one white, left one natural. See pics. Great swing! Best deal I’ve found. (Takes a while to put together but it is pretty simple)😀
customer_reviews.author: Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, right price, installed using a power tool
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised in a flat pack. Took some effort to put it together, recommend power drill with sockets. Be careful not to over-tighten the bolts in the slats.. I broke one. The install was a breeze. The size can easily take 3 people with average build, but the weight limit is 300 lbs. I might replace the chains for a 500 lbs weight bearing capacity. Placed in the backyard. Let's see how it holds up in the East Coast weather.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Jack Post swing (VERY NICE)
customer_reviews.text: I think this swing is very well made, and easy to assemble with basic tools. After i assemble it,i tried it, i did notice just like most swings it needed a little padding. I highly recommend this swing. Thanks Randy
customer_reviews.author: randall lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swing
customer_reviews.text: Very well made swing; super heavy duty. Only recommendation would be to apply a sealer to the wood for protection and duration.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. It was a little time consuming to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. It was a little time consuming to put together, but not difficult at all. We love everything about this beautiful swing!!!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Fairly straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Received seeing yesterday. Amened today. Easy, but tedious assembly. Do not over-tighten screws, as wood will crack. Special care at transition from back to seat. Just tighten enough for screws to be flush with wood. About an hour to assemble. Looks good. Will update with durability.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cline

customer_reviews.title: You must coat it.
customer_reviews.text: Put a coat of polyurethane on it put it together and gave it to my Grand daughter for a house warming present. And she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks beautiful when completed. Prior to assembling, I stained the wood as I wanted to use it in an outdoor application. Does not include a base but I was able to build one using 2 X 2s and a 2X 4 pressure treated lumber and swing kit from home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Quality of wood and stain is marginal and assembly takes a while, but overall an excellent value for it's price. Looks great and is strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Sarvo

customer_reviews.title: The product seems well made and easy to put together with good hardware
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made and easy to put together with good hardware. It sets very well as is, but I like to use a cushion and the cushion hurts the comfort of the unit as there is a slat on the lower bend that pushes the cushion forward. Good product, good price, good materials and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Danny M.

customer_reviews.title: 2 days after install
customer_reviews.text: Feels less sturdy than expected however easily held two adults total weight about 405. Very easy to install and very attractive. I added solar lights to frame. My new favorite spot.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing.
customer_reviews.text: This swing came completely unassembled but was easily put together by two people with a ratchet set. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLu

customer_reviews.title: Noce
customer_reviews.text: Worked nicely was missing a part but they gave us a credit and we got the part at the hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love the swing
customer_reviews.text: Love the swing. Easy to put together. I coated it to protect it from the weather. Several people has already experienced my swing and loved it. The price was so affordable. I would buy again in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: Milton O.

customer_reviews.title: Good Swing, Easy, but was received with damage.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together! Looks great! I'd've given it a 5 star rating if it wasn't for the fact that one of the base slats wasn't received with a crack that ran from one end to the other. Talked with Amazon and they're resolving the issue with a discount. Just have to find a replacement wood piece for when it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden Swing Buy
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself, but had to have another person involved in the hanging of the swing. Looks like quality product, had very little issues with the instructions. I love my Garden swing. great price, great product
customer_reviews.author: K. P

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable made materials!
customer_reviews.text: Set this swing up about a month ago and it already broke! I am currently 35 weeks pregnant and I was swinging on it and broke and dropped me to the ground. This is not a sturdy swing and I suggest staying away if pregnant! Cheaply made chain and screws. I suggest buying your own for your own safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: Assembly didn't seem super hard as I watched my uncle assemble this swing. Really though it's a beautiful swing at a great price. I will probably eventually stain and seal it, but it looks great and it's a great place to sit and enjoy the day. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. After checking the reviews on several swings in my price range, I chose this one. It had few complaints, and many positive reviews. I definitely made the right choice! This swing was super easy to assemble, with all parts and hardware present and in excellent condition. Applied a coat of polyurethane to help with weather resistance, and it was ready to go! Extremely pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Old Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good swing for the $
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our daughter's porch. It went together simply (careful not to over-tighten) and makes a sturdy porch swing. Suggest wiping it down with some 120-grit sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: Speakeasy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was not hard to assemble but it did take my husband and I some time to figure out the directions.
customer_reviews.author: K Hood

customer_reviews.title: Loved this swing so much I bought another for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this swing so much I bought another for my parents! The slight incline and high back make it really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wolfarth

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is good but be careful as we broke one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is good but be careful as we broke one of the slats almost immediately. Picked up a replacement at Lowes. It is not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this swing
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this swing! It does require assembly, so plan on spending some time on that. It isn’t hard, just tedious, but definitely easier with two people. We’ve been using it daily since July and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jessw28

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I stained and put a coat of spar urethane on it. It is a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love the swing.
customer_reviews.text: Love the swing, it was easy to put together, the instructions included were very clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing!
customer_reviews.text: Swing is very nice. We were not able to get it exactly square, but close enough. I will put a pillow and or blanket on it and you would never know. Very comfortable and solid!
customer_reviews.author: Wendinjay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: My 12yo son put this together. Pretty simple and well built. My husband and I sit on it together and fell very comfortable. We are about 400lbs combined. Would buy again. (Pic is of my don and me, not my husband lol)
customer_reviews.author: T. Rehnberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s a very good swing. I love the design except for the gold colored chain. I think I would’ve preferred a silver chain. Otherwise a very nice swing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K. Massie

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing, it adds the perfect touch to my porch , it was easy to hang and its sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works well as a porch swing. I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: A really nice swing and for me easily assembled..
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great hanging under covered area of yard. The wood is a little thin but we are just over 300 lbs.combined weight so it will be okay for us. For the low cost this is a great buy for us.
customer_reviews.author: DD Netherland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent swing
customer_reviews.text: When fully assembled it is solid and comfortable.It has a lot of parts and took a long time,but worth the effort. We are enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Niel in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great Porch Swing
customer_reviews.text: Y'all this porch swing is perfect. We have had this for over a year and it still looks great! It holds my husband and I just fine, no concerns with it breaking. I am a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Time to rock the Grand-baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great swing. It was super easy to put together and hang up. The wood pieces are very smooth, straight, and smell wonderful. Very sturdy and looks great. We have it on a covered porch, but i still might add a coat of waterproofer so it will last even longer. Sometimes it rains sideways here and the swing will get some side spray. All in all, love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alder2000

customer_reviews.title: So far this swing is great! The parts seemed to fit together very well ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this swing is great! The parts seemed to fit together very well and I have received numerous compliments about the colored wood. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: but this is great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days, but this is great bang for your buck. Well worth it versus a $300+ swing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great swing. Its been up for two months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: mtnbkn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This swing was easy to install and very comfortable. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Page

customer_reviews.title: Cool and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Not too hard to put together but it helps having 2 people do it. It's been hanging about 2 weeks and we are very pleased. I will have to stain it soon but I'm happy. It has a reddish color to it. I'm using oil based honey color. The swing does not look cheap. It's very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and they look great
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, we added a sealer being they are outside. We bought three, They look fabulous around our fire pit. They were also easy to assemble. We are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lovemyamazonstuff

customer_reviews.title: Very good swing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing! We build a pergola to hang the swing in our backyard. This is everyone’s favorite place to go to. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TanK

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, great price
customer_reviews.text: The perfect swing for my porch. It was a little more work putting it together than I thought, you screw in all the slats yourself, but worth it, took about an hour. Fits our family of four easily.
customer_reviews.author: Popebobfan

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and it's attractive
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, is reasonably priced and goes together fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for anything better at this price point!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife. It went together really smoothly and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas J Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was sturdy, comfortable, and looked nice at a reasonable price. This swing meets all the criteria.
customer_reviews.author: April D.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy another if needed.. Awesome looking and comfortable too!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great bargain! Looks and weathers great. Neighbors are asking about it all the time! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Delong

customer_reviews.title: I love my new swing
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself. If your handy and understand directions you will have no problem. I love my new swing. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gail R. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Swinging just fine.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of assembly. Some screws almost pulled through wood. Looks and works nice.
customer_reviews.author: rrohret

customer_reviews.title: Country  garden swing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to instal and feel sturdy. It remains to be seen how well it will do this summer when it will Be used the most. It sure looks better than the one I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rubeiz

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good buy! Looks great on my porch. It took my husband around 30 min to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mbw_555

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice swing! It was fairly easy to assemble and is quite comfortable. I hung it up on an old swingset my kids no longer use, and we've enjoyed it a lot. I did add springs, which make give it a more cushioned motion.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Takes a few moments to assemble but great swing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again-
customer_reviews.text: Great-lite-use it rain or shine-got a covered patio - Johny
customer_reviews.author: Johny J Rickert

customer_reviews.title: We hope to have the swing for a long time
customer_reviews.text: We love the swing. Great quality and seems well worth the price. Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Great swing, but had to paint it to get the color I wanted. I may have overnighted the slats which makes a lot of wood creaking sounds, but the swing is very nice. This is our second one, so they got my repete business.
customer_reviews.author: HayNow

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cute swing. Sits great! A little tedious to assemble but easy enough for me to do by myself. Don’t over tighten bolts as can cause some cracking in wood. Just hung it so if I remember I will come back and let y’all know how it holds up. Otherwise Great swing for the price. Plan on buying another for other end of my porch.
customer_reviews.author: amanda r.

customer_reviews.title: Love this new backyard swing.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little time to build with hand tools, but a power drill/screwdriver helps. All parts were there and the instructions were easy to follow. Great swing!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Had it up for about two months and so far, s0 good.
customer_reviews.author: utstrucken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great swing, looks very nice, but does need to be treated with wood stain for long lasting
customer_reviews.author: BO

customer_reviews.title: Swing is awesome, we use it often
customer_reviews.text: Swing is awesome, we use it often!! My wife and I put it together in about an hour with a socket set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, way better quality than we expected for the price and is comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how you could get a better deal. Putting it together takes some time but ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I don't know how you could get a better deal. Putting it together takes some time but it is a GREAT little swing. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great swing.
customer_reviews.text: Very good build, lots of screws and tedious work but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made bench for the price. Much better made than the one I had before. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Winn

product_meta.title: Jack Post CG-05Z Country Garden Swing Seat, Bronze
product_meta.description: Style:Country Garden SwingThis 2 person swing with chains is a comfortable, classic design perfect for your porch or with our WL-70Z swing frame. Our Country Garden Collection is quality, made to last furniture. The steel frames are painted in a bronze powder coated finish with quality hardwood derived from fruit trees. Assembly Required. Wood care guide included. Maximum Weight Capacity: 500 lbs. Assembled Dimensions: 52 X 27 X 24.75 inches.
feature_bullets: QUALITY: Our swing is made from quality hardwood from Indonesia. A tight grained hardwood free of knots. Sturdy, strong and naturally resistant to warping and rotting. The steel is powder coated to provide corrosion resistance. This product is engineered and marketed by a US based corporation since 1964. Our chairs are best used inside or under a covered area or porch away from direct weather.

WARRANTY-We stand behind our products and offer a three year warranty on this item. If you are missing a part or receive a broken piece, contact our Customer Service department at 800-800-4950. We are here to help! Our customer service is USA based with parts replacement support in the USA. We provide support in English-Spanish -French M-F 8am-8pm EST

TESTED FOR YOUR SAFETY: We double check our paint supplier with a third party to ensure our paint is free from toxins. We also perform tests to ensure we provide accurate weight restrictions. This item can hold 500 lbs and can sit up to 2 people.
COMFORT: We provide a comfortable product for you to relax and enjoy the moment.The smooth surface provides easy clean up.
